Operation 'post-acceptDispute' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description is too minimal. Added context about what accepting a dispute means (acknowledging the claim), the side effect (prevents further defense), what is returned, and guidance on when to use this operation for better AI agent decision-making.

data.description_suggestion: Accepts a dispute, indicating that you acknowledge the chargeback or dispute claim. This operation marks the dispute as accepted in the system and prevents further defense actions. Returns a confirmation of the acceptance. Use this when you decide not to contest the dispute.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. Added context about what accepting a dispute means (acknowledging the claim), the side effect (prevents further defense), what is returned, and guidance on when to use this operation for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'post-defendDispute' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description lacks essential context. Added information about what defending entails (submitting evidence), the purpose (contesting chargebacks), prerequisites (applicable defense reasons), and return value. This helps AI agents understand the operation's role in the dispute workflow.

data.description_suggestion: Defends a specific dispute by submitting defense information and evidence. This operation allows you to contest a chargeback or dispute claim by providing applicable defense reasons and supporting documentation. Returns confirmation of the defense submission. The dispute must have applicable defense reasons available before defending.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks essential context. Added information about what defending entails (submitting evidence), the purpose (contesting chargebacks), prerequisites (applicable defense reasons), and return value. This helps AI agents understand the operation's role in the dispute workflow.

message: Operation 'post-deleteDisputeDefenseDocument' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description is minimal. Added context about the operation's purpose (removing evidence), prerequisites (document must exist and dispute must be editable), and return value. This clarifies when and why an AI agent should use this operation.

data.current_description: Deletes a specific dispute defense document that was supplied earlier.
data.description_suggestion: Removes a previously supplied defense document from a dispute. This operation allows you to delete supporting evidence or documentation that was attached to a dispute defense. Returns confirmation of deletion. The document must have been previously supplied and the dispute must still be in an editable state.
data.reasoning: Original description is minimal. Added context about the operation's purpose (removing evidence), prerequisites (document must exist and dispute must be editable), and return value. This clarifies when and why an AI agent should use this operation.

message: Operation 'post-retrieveApplicableDefenseReasons' has semantic quality issues: missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description lacks operational context. Added information about what the operation returns (list of defense reason objects), when to use it (before defending), and what information is included (descriptions and document requirements). This helps AI agents understand the operation's role in the dispute defense workflow.

data.current_description: Returns a list of all applicable defense reasons to defend a specific dispute.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the list of defense reasons available for a specific dispute. This operation returns all applicable defense strategies and justifications that can be used when defending against the dispute. Use this to determine which defense reasons are valid before submitting a defense. Returns a list of defense reason objects with descriptions and supporting document requirements.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks operational context. Added information about what the operation returns (list of defense reason objects), when to use it (before defending), and what information is included (descriptions and document requirements). This helps AI agents understand the operation's role in the dispute defense workflow.

message: Operation 'post-supplyDefenseDocument' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Original description is too vague. Added context about what documents are (evidence, invoices, receipts), the requirement that they match defense reason types, and what is returned. This clarifies the operation's purpose and helps AI agents understand what inputs are needed and what to expect.

data.current_description: Supplies a specific dispute defense document.
data.description_suggestion: Uploads and attaches a defense document to a dispute. This operation allows you to submit supporting evidence, invoices, receipts, or other documentation required to defend against a dispute. Documents must match the required document types for the applicable defense reasons. Returns confirmation of the document upload and its association with the dispute.
data.reasoning: Original description is too vague. Added context about what documents are (evidence, invoices, receipts), the requirement that they match defense reason types, and what is returned. This clarifies the operation's purpose and helps AI agents understand what inputs are needed and what to expect.
